desc_id:
7 Bidadari Boutique Accommodation menampilkan bangunan di sekeliling kolam renang, menawarkan restoran, bar makanan ringan, serta kamar-kamar dengan dekorasi yang hangat dan pemandangan kolam renang. Tersedia layanan antar-jemput terjadwal gratis ke Legian, Kuta, dan Seminyak. Wi-Fi gratis dapat diakses di seluruh areanya.

7 Bidadari Boutique Accommodation berselang 15 menit berkendara dari Seminyak Square, 20 menit berkendara dari pantai Seminyak, dan 30 menit berkendara dari bandara internasional Ngurah Rai.

Setiap kamar ber-AC-nya menampilkan dekorasi dengan nuansa warna coklat yang elegan, dilengkapi TV kabel layar datar, area untuk duduk bersantai, dan brankas. Kamar mandi dalamnya menyediakan shower, handuk, dan perlengkapan mandi gratis.

Staf di meja depan 24-jam tersedia untuk membantu permintaan binatu dan pengaturan penyewaan mobil. Layanan antar-jemput bandara tersedia dengan biaya tambahan. Anda juga dapat menikmati pijat yang menenangkan di tempat dan jasa penitipan anak.

Pilihan makanan cepat saji ditawarkan di restoran hotel dan bar makanan ringan.
desc_en:
Built around an outdoor pool, 7 Bidadari Boutique Accommodation houses a restaurant, snack bar and warmly decorated rooms with pool views. Free scheduled shuttles within Legian, Kuta and Seminyak areas are offered. Wi-F is also accessible for free throughout the property.

7 Bidadari Boutique Accommodation is a 15-minute drive from Seminyak Square, 20-minute drive from Seminyak Beach and a 30-minute drive from Ngurah Rai International Airport.

Decorated with elegant brown tones, each air-conditioned room is well fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, seating area and a safety deposit box. A shower, towels and a set of free bath amenities are provided in each en suite bathroom.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk are available to assist with laundry requests and car rental arrangements. Airport transfer is available at additional fee. Guests also enjoy the convenience of on-site massage and babysitting services.

A selection of fast food is on offer at the hotel's restaurant and snack bar.

address: Jl Mangga Besar VIII NO.10D BaratÂ
